Interface RePattern

    public interface RePattern
    A compiled regular expression.

    • Method Detail

      • matcher

        ReMatcher matcher(CharSequence data,
                ExecFlags... flags)
        Create a matcher from a pattern.
        Parameters:
        data - the initial data that the matcher will process; ReMatcher.reset(CharSequence) may be used to change it.
        flags - optional flags that change the behavior of the matcher.
        Returns:
        the matcher

      • matcher

        ReMatcher matcher(CharSequence data,
                EnumSet<ExecFlags> flags)
        Create a matcher from a pattern.
        Parameters:
        data - the initial data that the matcher will process; ReMatcher.reset(CharSequence) may be used to change it.
        flags - optional flags that change the behavior of the matcher.
        Returns:
        the matcher
